alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 28 at 12:13PM PST until November 30 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Above 4000 feet, snow accumulations between 1 to 2 feet. Below 4000, total snow accumulations 10 to 15 inches. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph * WHERE...Methow, Twisp, Loup Loup Pass, Mazama, Plain, Stehekin, Stevens Pass, Winthrop, Leavenworth, Conconully, and Holden Village. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Tuesday evening and Wednesday commutes will be impacted.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
